name: Sunny Beach
description: A pristine beach with golden sand and crystal clear waters. Seashells and driftwood line the shore.
clue: Where the morning sun kisses the sand, and waves whisper secrets to the land.

name: Mystic Forest
description: A dense forest filled with ancient trees, mysterious sounds, and shafts of sunlight filtering through the canopy.
clue: Among the eldest trees where shadows dance, seek the place where spirits entrance.

name: Thunder Peak
description: The highest mountain on the island, shrouded in clouds with a magnificent view of the entire archipelago.
clue: Where eagles soar and thunder roars, above the clouds and ancient lores.

name: Crystal Cave
description: A sparkling underground cavern filled with glowing crystals and underground pools.
clue: In depths where diamonds dream and gleam, where underground rivers softly stream.

name: Ancient Ruins
description: The remnants of a lost civilization with crumbling stone structures and mysterious hieroglyphs.
clue: Where forgotten kings once held their court, and time has made their glory short.

name: Lighthouse Tower
description: A tall stone lighthouse standing guard over the rocky coastline, its beacon long since extinguished.
clue: Where sailors once found their way home, beneath the tower's ancient dome.

name: Hidden Cove
description: A secluded bay surrounded by towering cliffs, accessible only by a narrow pathway.
clue: In nature's secret embrace hidden well, where only the brave dare to dwell.

name: Dragon's Peak
description: The most treacherous peak on the island, said to be the lair of ancient dragons.
clue: Where legends tell of fire and flight, in the realm of eternal night.
